When We Build Stuff

I recently discovered this great presentation by checking out some of my follow-recommendations on twitter. Wilson Miner was one of them. This talk adresses everyone who builds software and makes some of the broader side-effects of designing things other people use more visible.

The presentation itself is more a piece of acting than a usual talk. I enjoyed the variety so I hope you will too.

Wilson Miner - When We Build from Build on Vimeo.

@martinklepsch, August 2012
